channel.title: CVE Feed for TUBITAK -- Pardus Software Center
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TUBITAK -- Pardus Software Center

item.title: CVE-2021-3806|2024-08-03T17:09:09.454Z -- tubitak -- pardus%20software%20center
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability on Pardus Software Center's "extractArchive" function could allow anyone on the same network to do a man-in-the-middle and write files on the system.
